resources.string: We hope you had a great time away. Ready to plan your next holiday? Feel free to browse our great range of holidays. Or contact us about your recent trip.
You are welcome to contact us If you have questions related to your recent trip or are planning your next holiday.
Find a holiday designed for you
The e-mail address you have written does not match the booking reference. If your didn't state an e-mail address when booking you can login using your phone number instead.
Sorry, we didn't recognise your details. Please verify that the details are the same as in your booking or check the "Help logging in" section below.

Booking reference is incorrect. The booking reference should have seven digits (numbers and letters). Swedish bookings start with 1, Finnish bookings start with A, Norwegian bookings start with 3 and Danish bookings start with B.::E-mail or phone number is incorrect. Make sure to write EITHER e-mail address OR phone number and to write it exactly as you did when you booked your trip.

To log in to this app, enter booking number and either the email address or phone number. \n\nThe Booking number was sent to you by e-mail or post when you booked your trip with Fritidsresor / Star Tour/ Finnmatkat.
If you’re still having problems logging in, please contact us and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.

We're sorry you're having problems logging in to the app. Please fill in the details below and check that everything’s correct. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Name: 
Booking reference: 
Phone number: 
E-mail address: 
Phone type: 
Operating system:
Help logging in to the app
Sorry some of our content hasn’t loaded correctly. Please try viewing another page or close the app and connect again later.
Sorry to view this page internet connection is required. Please refresh the page.

This app is designed for customers who have booked a holiday with Fritidsresor, Star Tour or Finnmatkat. Choose your preferred language below. If you want to book a holiday - please go to the "Book a holiday" section.
Modern hotels with an urban touch close to shopping and nightlife. Free WiFi throughout the hotel and breakfast up until noon.
Hotels designed for adults traveling without children, always near the beach with many bars and restaurants.
Our best holiday villages with large pool areas, beach location, children’s club and lots of activities for all ages.
Affordable resort hotels with many facilities and fun activities led by our Blue Star hosts.
Hotels where you have free access to an exciting water park.
International hotels with All Inclusive, activities and evening entertainment. Here you get great value for money.
Active holidays with everything included - not just food and beverage, but also plenty of sports, water activities and fitness classes.
Five star accommodation for adults and children – designed to fuel the senses. Always with spa, wellness and several gourmet restaurants.
Tip: Same e-mail address as in your booking. If you haven't added an e-mail address just write your phone number instead.

Tip: The booking reference should have seven digits (numbers and letters). Swedish bookings start with 1, Finnish bookings start with A, Norwegian bookings start with 3 and Danish bookings start with B.
Please check each field matches your booking details.
You failed to log in three times please use the help below.

This app is for customers who have already booked a trip with Fritidsresor / Star Tour / Finnmatkat. If you're not yet a customer you can see our offering under "Book a trip" below. \n\nLogin with your booking number and e-mail address or phone number. Enter the details in the same way as when you booked the trip.
Enter your e-mail address OR phone number
Enter your e-mail address OR phone number
The same e-mail address as in your booking. If you have not provided an e-mail address move on to the telephone number.
The same e-mail address as in your booking. If you have not provided an e-mail address move on to the telephone number.
The daytime phone number (eg, mobile) that you specified in your booking.
It's the final countdown, your holiday to [location] is just days away.
This time tomorrow you’ll be in [location] - don't forget to pack your passport!
Your holiday to [location] is less than a month away! Have you checked your passport is in date?
There are many exciting excursions for you in [location]. Make sure you check them out!
Don't forget your flight departs [when] at [time] from [airport].
It’s going to be [temperature] in [location] on [when].
What do you think of our app? It would be great to hear your views.
We hope you had a great holiday with us.
Welcome to your personalised travel companion. Check back for handy tips and updates!
Got a question about your booking? We're here to help if you need us.
Welcome to [location]! We hope you have a great holiday. If you need anything, just get in touch.

Please fill in the details of your enquiry below so that we can help you further.

Name: [name]
Email: 
Phone number: 
First line of address: 
Postcode (optional): 
Booking reference number: [booking]
Departure date: [date]
Destination: [destination]

Please enter any questions or comments here:
Question to Fritidsresor / Finnmatkat / Star Tour

Starting two weeks before departure, you can ask questions directly to the reps at your destination. They can advice on everything from beaches to excursions and help you plan your holiday with us. The easiest way to get in contact is by sending a question here in the app.
Question to our guides at your destination
Call us or send an e-mail if you have a question about your booking, your flights or your hotel. We can also help you upgrade your holiday booking.
Two weeks before departure date you'll be able to speak to a holiday rep directly through this page. We'll send you a message when the rep becomes available.
Between 8am - 8pm your rep will respond within
If you asked a question, your rep will respond within
Your conversation history may be out of date
You have [amount] messages! Please visit your Guide online.
You have [amount] transfer messages! Please visit your Guide online.
You have [amount] unread message! Please visit your Guide online.
You have [amount] unread messages! Please visit your Guide online.
You're currently offline. Would you like to send this message now via SMS? Operator's costs apply.
You have recieved a new message
We were unable to send the message. Would you like to try again?
Welcome to MyMessages. This is where you can find any useful updates we send about your holiday.
I'm currently in [location] on my #[brand] holiday!
[days] days before I visit [location] on my #[brand] #holiday!
I'm going to [location] on my #[brand] #holiday today!
Just [days] days until my #[brand] #holiday to [location]. I can’t wait!
I’m going to [location] today on my #holiday. I can’t wait!
Just [days] days until my #holiday to [hotel], [resort]. I can’t wait!
I’m going to [resort] on my #holiday today. I can’t wait!
Sorry, you need to connect your Facebook account to share content from this app. Please visit your settings to do this now.
Sorry, you need to connect your Twitter account to share content from this app. Please visit your settings to do this now.
Just [days] days until my #Thomson #holiday to [location], it’s [temperature]˚C today!
I’m going to [location] today on my #holiday. It’s [temperature]˚C today!
Send your full holiday summary to yourself or other passengers.
You’ll need this number to book an extra for your holiday.
Sorry, we can’t display your flight details
You'll need this number if you contact us with any questions.
I’ll be in the air in
You can now beat the queues by checking in online and printing your boarding card.
Please make sure to arrive at the airport well in, the check in closes one hour before departure time.
All flight times are based on local times. Flight timings and airline details are subject to change.
With our great range of excursions

Hold on, we’re just finding your holiday…
We’re just checking details for you…
Are you sure you want to log out?
Thanks for signing up. Keep an eye on your inbox for upcoming offers.
Oops, looks like something went wrong. Please check your connection and try again.
Our top deals tailored to you, straight to your inbox.
Please enter a valid email address

I would like to receive great deals and holiday news via email (Your data will not be disclosed to a third party and you can revoke consent at any time). By opting in, you agree to our privacy policy.

Please read our Privacy Policy and Data Protection Notice and confirm you agree to our use of your information provided (which may in special situations include sensitive personal data) by ticking the box below.
By clicking 'Submit' you confirm that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy and consent to our use of your information.
We’d like to send you useful updates about your holiday, like online check-in, Select-your-Seat and exclusive offers.
From 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this app?
We are glad that you like the app and appreciate your feedback.
Sorry to hear you’re not a fan. Please let us know how we can improve the experience for you.
Rate us on the App Store
Rate us on the Google Play Store
We’d love to hear your feedback about the [appName] app. What do you like or dislike? Is there anything you’d like to see added or improved? Tell us your thoughts here…
What do you think of our app? It'd be great to hear your views.
